sourcesContent:
import Button from './components/Button';
import Input from './components/Input';

import { Container, Content, Row} from './styles';
import { useState } from 'react'; 

const App = () => {
  const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState ();
  return (
    <Container>
      <Content>
        <Input value={currentNumber}/>
        <Row>
            <Button label = "x" />
            <Button label = "/"/>
            <Button label = "C"/>
            <Button label = "X"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label = "7" />
            <Button label = "8"/>
            <Button label = "9"/>
            <Button label = "-"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label = "4" />
            <Button label = "5"/>
            <Button label = "6"/>
            <Button label = "+"/>
          </Row>
          <Row>
            <Button label = "1" />
            <Button label = "2"/>
            <Button label = "3"/>
            <Button label = "="/>
          </Row>
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
